text: Mr Royston is the best tutor that I ever had. Before Mr Royston taught me I used to do terribly for both my Pure Physics and Chemistry Exams. (Around C6 - E8 Range) In fact, I hated chemistry and physics. However, when Mr Royston started teaching me I started enjoying physics and chemistry and my grades started to improve. In just a short period of time I managed to score B3 for both my O-Level Pure Science exams. (Mr Royston not only makes lessons fun and engaging, he has many techniques to help improve students learning) Other than the many techniques that helped improved my learning and understanding of the subject. He also imparted me methods to help me memorise. As a student who hates to memorise, I am always unable to memorise. However, using the methods that Mr Royston taught me I started being able to memorise things that I need.
